metadata.title: CVE-2018-7173 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: A large loop in JBIG2Stream::readSymbolDictSeg in xpdf 4.00 allows an attacker to cause denial of service via a specific file due to inappropriate decoding.

notes.note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler has a symHeight > 0x40000000 test, looks unaffected

criterions.comment: ipe package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
poppler package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-1ubuntu1').
xpdf package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
